name: .STG File Extension
summary: Learn about .STG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Backup created by ActiveSync, a program used to synchronize PCs with mobile devices; contains a backup of all mobile device files, including contacts, notes, and calendar data; typically seen with the filename backup.stg.

content: NOTE: Microsoft removed the backup and restore feature beginning with ActiveSync version 4.2. To recover backup files with ActiveSync, use version 4 or an earlier version that is compatible with STG files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
